title: DYING_S0UL
author: DYING_S0UL
content: I think I just made a new discovery. I repeat, "I think". This discovery won't help mankind fight off dinasores.  You can say it's useless discovery since it serves no purpose.All of us knows that, the forum is quite old. And the SMF version it uses is also quite old. So it has a lot of modern day features missing. As an example, modern day emojis. The forum does have some emojis, but not enough. Despite this, many users are using emojis. So how do they do it? I tried to check it by quoting what they wrote. And I found nothing, it was just a basic emoji.The "discovery" is that when you put in a modern day emoji and click preview, it won't show up in the preview section. But if you directly post it, The emoji will appear. I used to wonder why my emojis didn't appear. Because I would always check the preview before posting, I didn't realized that. I just thought something was broken from my side (until today). But now I know, it was always there, it just didn't show up.

comments.author: DVlog
comments.body: It's great to know that and if you find a way to delete it in 10 minutes after posting please let us know.

It is different from the emoji that we have on our phone keyboard.Correct me if I'm wrong.
